slide.title: %<function>%
slide.blurb: The *%<function>%* tag is used to define both normal and aggregate functions. Name, type and returned data type have to be specified using attributes.
Function parameters are defined using the *%<parameter>%* tag.
Data private to a function is declared within the *%<data>%* tag.
The *%<code>%* tag takes the code for normal functions, aggregate function code is put into the *%<clear>%*, *%<add>%* and *%<result>%* tags
